page.title: 04Families at work in Horwich
page.content:
Within the area the majority of households have two working adults. This explains why there is a predominance of expensive cars in the area. These are used for travelling to and from work.{The majority of {people are employed in the area.
In households where there is only one working adult there are usually children who have to be looked after. This means one adult will stay at home to look after them,{this is not {necessarily the woman.
The adult who remains at home often has a car as well and this is used for shorter trips such as shopping and taking the children to school. This car is usually an inferior one than that used for work.
